text: imagine thinking midnight bagpipes are bad - try overhearing amateur rap battles through thin walls every other night...inspect element on those rhymes isn't pretty. 😬
seriously though how 'bout never ending hallway conversations loud enough to Netflix binge through 😑 good walls count for nothing when your neighbors' gossip game's too strong
karaoke at midnight sounds rough but imagine early birds outside your window doing their best crow impression at dawn - way worse than alarm clocks tbh 😖
coffee aromas drifting from hidden lane-way cafes - they're like lowkey markers for home when lost after uni classes 😌
bet most overlook grungy laneway cafes - vibe’s unmatched tbh
student loans hit different when its your own budget constraints

for me it’s juggling uni assignments & work shifts at the cafe where every payslip means less stress 'bout bills instead of more coffee grounds 🤷‍♀️ that wage grind screams adulting louder than any ceremony ever could tbh
just waiting for my "act responsible" badge at 30 😂
